original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽7.13. Parittārammaṇattika🔽Naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  paritta ārammaṇa ttika  na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: The Triad on Limited Objects, etc.🔽With a non-limited object … With a exalted object … With an measureless object … (Abbreviated.)
With respect to cause, forty-nine … With respect to the unincluded, forty-nine.
